search.query: index=main sourcetype="3-tweets-export-log" tweet="*$tweet_contains$*" | eval confidence = round(case(sentiment=="POSITIVE", score_positive, sentiment=="NEGATIVE", score_negative, sentiment=="MIXED", score_mixed, sentiment=="NEUTRAL", score_neutral) * 100, 2) $high$ | where in (sentiment, "POSITIVE", "NEUTRAL", "NEGATIVE") | timechart span=$span$ count(sentiment) by sentiment | addtotals |rename Total as "Total Tweets"
